question: Is there a dua or something I can read so Allah will make it easy for me, please read details.
answer:
QUESTION
I am not very good looking person. When sitting in bayaans or even going to masjid people always stare at me which is not very nice. This puts me off and I don?t tend to sit in bayaans or taleem anymore which really is my loss. So is there anything I can read or dua that Allah will make it easy for me to participate in ijtamaiy amaals.
ANSWER


Share:
First and foremost, try and repel the idea that people are staring at you.
This could also be psychological. Even if you are sure people are staring at
you, ignore them and continue with your life. It is not your external beauty
that counts, it is what is within you and what you make of yourself.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
FATWA DEPT.

CHECKED AND APPROVED: Mufti Ebrahim Desai
